description: Template showing all available fields for function metadata

example_function.description: Technical description of what this function does

_field_descriptions.function_id: REQUIRED: Unique identifier for the function
_field_descriptions.memory_mb: REQUIRED: Memory allocation in MB (128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, or higher)
_field_descriptions.description: REQUIRED: Technical description of the function
_field_descriptions.data_input_gb: REQUIRED: Input data per invocation in GB (default: 0.0)
_field_descriptions.data_output_gb: REQUIRED: Output data per invocation in GB (default: 0.0)
_field_descriptions.source_location: REQUIRED: GCS bucket region where data is stored (default: 'us-east1')
_field_descriptions.invocations_per_day: REQUIRED: Number of invocations per day (default: 1)
_field_descriptions.latency_important: OPTIONAL: Whether low latency is critical (default: false)
_field_descriptions.gpu_required: OPTIONAL: Whether GPU acceleration is needed (default: false)
_field_descriptions.vcpus: OPTIONAL: Number of vCPUs (1-8). If not specified, defaults to 1 for non-GPU, 8 for GPU workloads
_field_descriptions.allowed_regions: OPTIONAL: List of allowed GCP region codes. Empty array [] means all regions are allowed (default: [])
_field_descriptions.allow_schedule_caching: OPTIONAL: Allow reusing schedules when metadata unchanged and forecast fresh (< 7 days). Set to false to always regenerate schedules (default: true)

_default_values.vcpus: 1 for non-GPU, 8 for GPU (if not specified)
